posts.post_title: SOLD: Bender, no trees, SGC 4 HOFer...
posts.post_content:
Hall of Famer Albert "Chief" Bender.  This is clearly the NO TREES version, but SGC slipped up on that.  :rolleyes:

$SOLD via personal check, money order, or PP gift. Price includes shipping in the lower 48.

Please send me a PM if interested. Thank you.
